TopicTitle: [STOCK] Fly through a Mun arch without touching the surface of the Mun

Articles.Content:
Must show pictures of takeoff, muner approach, flying through the arch and a picture of the kerbals safe back home.

Noob tier: Fly through the arch, using the developer console.

Normal tier: Do the mission without using the developer console.

God tier: Fly through both Mun arches and return home safely.

Holy-****-why-aren't-you-at-NASA tier: Before approaching the Mun, get into a minmus orbit with an apoapsis below 500m. You may not touch the minmus surface either.

I eagerly await your attempts.
What developer console? We can't access that can we?
I might take that challenge. Might be abusing the .16 fuel bug though...

What developer console? We can't access that can we?

Ctrl - Shift - Alt - d
Lol, thanks. Didn't know that was there.

I heard somewhere that the arch has some sort of invisible wall making it impossible to pass through in 0.16, so isn't it impossible? (or this wall of death is just for Kerbals?)

And if 0.15 counts, here is what I managed:
Wow, major props there Cykyrios! Like you said, too bad the Kerbals have some invisible force against them around there.
